title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The New York Times: From Google Cloud Platform to AWS (MAM337)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 纽约时报：从谷歌云平台迁移到AWS (MAM337)
abstract: Discover how The New York Times overhauled its gaming platform by migrating critical gaming workloads from Google Cloud Platform to Amazon Web Services. Learn why this media giant chose to make the switch and explore the best practices that ensured a seamless transition of some of the internet's most popular pages and games. We'll delve into the journey from Google's Datastore, App Engine, and GKE to Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service(EKS) and Amazon DynamoDB. Uncover how this strategic move not only modernized The Times' tech stack but also significantly enhanced performance, scalability, and operational efficiency.
abstract_cn: 了解《纽约时报》如何通过将关键游戏工作负载从谷歌云平台迁移到亚马逊云科技来全面改造其游戏平台。了解这家媒体巨头选择进行迁移的原因,并探索确保互联网上一些最受欢迎的页面和游戏实现无缝过渡的最佳实践。我们将深入探讨从Google Datastore、App Engine和GKE迁移到Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service(EKS)和Amazon DynamoDB的历程。揭示这一战略举措如何不仅实现了《纽约时报》技术栈的现代化,还显著提升了性能、可扩展性和运营效率。
